com.googlecode.gmail4j.javamail
Class ImapConnectionHandler

java.lang.Object
  javax.mail.event.ConnectionAdapter
      com.googlecode.gmail4j.javamail.ImapConnectionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, javax.mail.event.ConnectionListener
public class ImapConnectionHandler
extends javax.mail.event.ConnectionAdapter

JavaMail based IMAP ConnectionAdapter for Connection events.

ImapConnectionHandler is the adapter which receives connection events. This class logs the connection event services if getSession().setDebug(true).

Example: 

     // if implementing a protcol.
     Transport transport = getSession().getTransport();
     transport.addConnectionListener(new ImapConnectionHandler(
                  new ConnectionInfo(loginCredentials.getUsername(),
                  gmailSmtpHost,
                  gmailSmtpPort)));

0.4
